website_summaries.verdict: This compact carry case is ideal for everyday use and comes with Nintendo's stamp of approval for added buyer confidence. Quality plus nifty features for a reasonable price.
pros: Boasts premium construction and ergonomic design that's endorsed by Nintendo
Interior is specially molded for a custom fit
Features a padded storage pocket to keep screens scratch-free
Comes with 2 game cases to  hold up to 8 game or SD cards
Hard shell offers superior protection from knocks and drops
cons: Game cards can pop out of the cases a bit too easily when opened
Some owners complained of an unpleasant smell

website_summaries.verdict: Protection, style, and well organised storage are just a few things this RDS case has to offer.
pros: The case is sturdy and provides excellent drop protection
The simple black design with Nintendo Switch logo is pleasing to the eye
The interior is well organised and soft, to prevent scratches
The middle pocket is perfect for storing a charging cable, and doubles as a screen protector
Strong hook-and-loop tape holds the switch in place
The case provides enough space that none of the buttons are pushed down
Includes 2 plastic cases to store extra SD cards or games
cons: The plastic cases for games and SD cards are difficult to open

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I feel scammed, there is no pocket on the inside, instead you get a flimsy and cheap stand that takes a lot of space, which makes it really hard to fit the switch in the case. The R and L buttons on the joycons (the bumpers) are constantly being pressed inside the case because it's too tight ( which is why I had to store the switch upside down to avoid this problem) I think what people have been giving 4 or 5 starts was a different version, because this is garbage and shouldn't be recommended by Amazon or certified by Nintendo. This is in my opinion a blatant bait and switch (no pun intended)
customer_reviews.author: Afif88

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a case that was supposed to come with a pouch. This came with a stand. The switch barely fits inside. Wishing I had not chosen this particular product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Burke

customer_reviews.title: I have been delivered a different case
customer_reviews.text: It's supposed to have a zippered pocket inside not a stand as shown in the picture, can I return it?
customer_reviews.author: Moath Qasem

customer_reviews.title: Was not exactly same as product shown
customer_reviews.text: The pictures for the product I ordered had a "pouch with a zipper" for accessories inside, which doubled as a screen protector. When I received the case and opened it, much to my surprise, there was no zipper pouch at all in the case. No interior pouch at all. The case itself is "OK". The game cases fall out easily it appears, and the screen protector (which in the one I received doubles as a flip up stand) was a little too tight and put what seemed like a lot of pressure on the screen. Not ideal. I returned the case.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Hawkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Case. Fix the description
customer_reviews.text: The product I received is different than what described. But why I’m still giving a 4star? Because it’s still a great case. They changed the pocket to a switch stand, it may not be what I want, but if you prefer a stand instead of a pocket, definitely consider this one. It would just be great if they fix the website descriptions.
customer_reviews.author: X. L.

customer_reviews.title: great carrying case
customer_reviews.text: If the switch isn't docked, it's in this thing. I can actually fit everything in this case. All our physical cames, two extra joy-cons with all four wrist straps, a wall charger and long USB-C cable. It takes a little practice moving things around to be as efficient as possible, but you can do it just fine. Alternatively, if I take the charger out and the extra joy-cons, i can take a whole-console skin protector shell in it as well. Just depends where i'm going. It fits everywhere and makes us feel more secure about transporting the switch around. Good quality feel to everything. I don't ever feel unsure with a zipper or anything falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Dan D.

customer_reviews.title: Protect your Switch!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic case for a fantastic entertainment system. Hasn't seen much banging up or anything, but it looks good, is compact/slim, and has a nice, felt cover with Velcro to secure it down before zipping up the case itself. I don't try to squeeze anything into the case besides the Switch itself and some games, but I tend to carry this along with a backpack for longer trips, so bringing the charger separately isn't a problem for me, but may be for some people.
customer_reviews.author: Philip M

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, keeps my Switch protected, space for games & small accesories (Joycon straps, earbuds, etc) - not much space for anything aisde from that plus the Switch + attached joycons & game storage. Meant more for a one day outing case rather than a overnight case, I'd recommend a bigger case if you want to take the dock/charger etc. My only complaint is like other reviewers have put off, occasionally the plastic game storage units will pop out of the case. Not a big deal, just a minor annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Kewne

customer_reviews.title: Durable and utilitarian.
customer_reviews.text: It's a rough shell, your switch will be nice n cozy. Have yet to drop or throw it at someone so I can't testify to how well the switch or the person would hold up, respectively. The two cartridge/SD card holders are a nice addition, although the game cartridges don't lock it place which is a minor gripe. If you open it with slightly too much force they could go flying. And did. Pro tip the screen cover works as a stand as well for when your arms or neck inevitably weaken after extended gaming sessions. Compact and can easily fit in a bookbag or carry on.
customer_reviews.author: Frodadd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case with only one flaw
customer_reviews.text: The case is just the right size for the switch and comes with a plastic carry case for you switch games the fits snuggly and securely with the device inside the case as well. However, the case does not have enough room for the ends of the joy sticks to be included in the case. In all honesty though, I rarely use those ends even at home and have never used them while flying or on any trip but for others that do use them it is worth knowing.
customer_reviews.author: Samson Gebre

customer_reviews.title: What I received was not the item advertised!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Nintendo Switch case I received was not what is in the product description and screenshot. The product description states the following: ***Padded Screen Protector ***Quick access zippered pocket for accessories ***Recessed panel specifically to store game cases This case does not have this but instead an adjustable viewing stand which I do not need or want. The case that was advertised was one I already have and enjoy and this is why I ordered it for my second switch. I am very disappointed for this false advertising and waste of my time.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitriy Melik-Karamov

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made with only a few complaints
customer_reviews.text: This case is awesome. It's super sturdy and constructed well. It definitely protects my switch. It has room to hold 8 games as well, more than I will ever need. I wish it was a little deeper as I did buy new controllers with the grips and they will not fit in this case. It is also not easy to get the games out of the storage area as I wish it was. Overall I'm super happy with this case, though.
customer_reviews.author: Woolie

customer_reviews.title: received knock-off
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this case so I could start bringing my switch with me but when it arrived it looked nothing like the picture. There was no pocket inside and the 'stand' took up so much room that I was unable to close the case with my switch in it. The stand also was incredibly difficult to fit into the case with the switch and pushing it down would put a lot of pressure on the screen. I'm very disappointed and will be buying a new case from a local game store since I can't trust that I'll be getting the official one from here.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, but that smell
customer_reviews.text: This case was bit larger than I thought it would be but I do very much like it. It protects the Switch well and has room for some other accessories. The game / memory card cased are a nice touch but do need some retention mechanism as they tend to fly out if the Switch is not in the case. Some other reviewers have good solutions for this problem. The real issue I have is the smell of the materials. I have had this for two weeks now and whenever I open the case I still get that off-gassing of foam or adhesive smell. It is pretty powerful. Hopefully it dissipates soon.
customer_reviews.author: JRob

customer_reviews.title: My only issue is it seems like you can't fit the Joy-Con Straps comfortably inside (you ...
customer_reviews.text: My only issue is it seems like you can't fit the Joy-Con Straps comfortably inside (you can do it but then they're pushing really quite hard down on your switches screen). Otherwise, this is a great carrying case for the switch! I completed my portable switch solutions with a big 'ol battery and a man purse (for accessories, the battery, the Joy-Con Straps, etc...) and I've got an amazing on the go switch situation! I also really appreciate the included cartridge/Micro SD cases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A place for my Switch
customer_reviews.text: This is a good travel case. It's got a medium hardness outer shell and a soft lining inside. There's a soft, sewn-in bag that you can put various items in that I haven't used for anything yet. It comes with two plastic cases that can fit four game cartridges and two plastic cases that can fit two microSD cards each. The microSD cases fit in the game cartridge cases and take up one slot each (so three games and two microSD cards will fit in each case). There's a slot for the larger cases but no straps to hold the cases down so it's not really that great.
customer_reviews.author: Fried

customer_reviews.title: This case made my back happy!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I can't say I've abused it enough to know if it's sturdy. I'm an adult and was pretty gentle when I packed it but the thing about this case I absolutely love is the little prop up backing that perfectly holds the switch... it seriously saved my back and allowed me to over play Zelda when normally I would have crumbled from hunching over. It's worth it for that prop up (and the cases but whatever xD)
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: A little nicer might have been better
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice compact case, big enough for the switch, a few games, maybe a couple of other things. Definitely not large enough for everything that you might like to carry with it, but at least all of the basics. I'm not really sure that I'd have wanted one much larger, but it means that I have to keep a few things at home, or carry outside of the case. It's a very nice case though, heavy duty, and I don't have to worry about dropping the unit when it's protected in the case. It was well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Garner

customer_reviews.title: Protection a fraction of cost of new Switch. Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This case is a great investment to protect your Nintendo Switch. I feel it is a bit pricy but it is a fraction of the price for a new Switch should anything happen to it. The game and memory cases are a nice touch. It makes traveling with your Switch a lot easier and brings peace of mind. I'd like to see a longer sash be installed in a next version / product. I think it'd be cool (obviously brings more risk as people swing it).
customer_reviews.author: BenK

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke after 1 day
customer_reviews.text: The handle broke after ONE day! Looks sturdy but apparently can’t hold up to actually using the handle as a handle.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any Switch owner
customer_reviews.text: This case is a must have in my opinion for anyone that has a Nintendo Switch. The case has a hard Nylon exterior perfect for preventing damage on drops. There is a "mold" for perfect fitting for the Switch inside the case. There is also space to store some games and a small bag inside for a USB-C cable. Anyone on the go with a Switch should invest in one of these.
customer_reviews.author: K-Dub

customer_reviews.title: Best basic carrying case
customer_reviews.text: This is the case that all my research led me to. The case is rigid, and should protect your unit in a fully packed bag. The cut outs for the joycons attached to the unit is a really nice touch. I appreciate the convenient cartridge holders, and the additional storage holds joystick caps and other random small things, but doesn't hold the power cable (not a big deal).
customer_reviews.author: Strider

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easily portable
customer_reviews.text: Overall this has been a great carrying case for my switch and it has lasted me for such a long time. The material is also very durable, making this case last a long time. I have been looking for a case for my switch for a long time and this is exactly what I needed. The only thing about this case is that there is not any space to put any extra joy-cons in it but it fits everything else plus a few games really well. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking to buy a case for their switch.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: It's a solid case. It can take a beating, or a dig biting frenzy... trust me it can survive a lot. It's easy to carry around as well. I wish it had a bit more space. You can store up to 8 game cartridges (6 if you're storing SD cards), which is fine for me but I'd rather have some more space for joycon accessories. If it did, spontaneous gaming with friends would be so much easier. But it's not the end of the world for an otherwise great product
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Sanatan

customer_reviews.title: Great Nintendo Switch Case!
customer_reviews.text: Great case for my son’s Nintendo Switch. Not too bulky and secures and protects his Switch when we’re traveling. Not a lot of storage if you want to bring a lot of game cartridges, but for my son it is enough for now. We buy online games anyway. Good Switch case that is good quality and doesn't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S.

customer_reviews.title: I love this case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. It holds the Switch, the two Joycons, and my screen cleaning cloth. I could do without the game holders in the bottom (I'm only going to buy stuff through the online store), but I guess they don't take up any space (that space would be wasted because of the fins off the back of the Joycons). It would be nice, though, if you could store the wrist straps for the Joycons under there. Instead, they go in the zipper pocket up top.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Whitworth

customer_reviews.title: Protection and Luxury
customer_reviews.text: A tuff case on the outside. A plush protective inside. Everything has been thought of including an inside pouch to hold your game cartridges. sits comfortably with high quality materials and thought out design and portability forward thinking. Everything from the little handle onto to the rugged ballistic style material used on the outside has been carefully designed for gamers on the go. good for traveling in a car or a plane.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Missing Mesh Pocket
customer_reviews.text: My case is missing the mesh pocket which is unfortunate. But other then that item seems sturdy enough to throw in back pack and be on the move
customer_reviews.author: mitchell teed

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price! Super high quality product. It also said when I ordered it that it may have arrived after Christmas, but it wound up getting here days before, so I was real happy about that too. My son is thrilled with the case, especially how it turns into a little stand to prop the Switch up.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great carrying case i feel very confident taking my switch places and throwing it in my backpack when it is in this case and feel good knowing its not going to get damaged. i also love how i can carry multiple games since i like having physical games instead of digital so its very handy being able to have them in there own case and i also love how it brings a small iner bag to put my headphones and cleaning cloth inside
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: It's a well-built, simple and functional protective case. You're not going to be able to carry much more in here than the Switch and some game cards, so plan accordingly re: charging. But it's easy to carry and doesn't add much bulk, so you can still fit the whole bundle into a coat pocket pretty easily. I took this on several flights recently and really appreciated its lean portability and protection as I went through security clearance.
customer_reviews.author: Ira L. Wray

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic case
customer_reviews.text: This is where I keep my switch when I’m not using it or when I want to take it somewhere. I see people complaining about the space. Take it for what it is, you cannot really fit anything except the switch itself and some games. If you want to fit the charger or dock, but a bigger case. This case has held up well. I have dropped it a few times, switch has been fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: One of my Grandsons was taking his Switch to school and playing with Friends at lunch time. He kept saying how it was hard for him to corral both of his controllers, etc. after the bell rang and he had dropped one of them and was glad it still worked. So, I ordered him a case, sent it to his Home and surprised him. He called to tell me Thank You and he said his Friends said to tell me 'thank you' also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You Need This, The Best Travel Case!
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite carrying case for my Nintendo Switch. It is made of hard shell nylon materials that keep my game console safe. Unlike other brands of carrying case that's bulking, this case is relatively slim consider the amount of materials it uses that makes it hard and protective of the console inside. This carrying case also comes with two bonus game cartridge cases, with each capable of holding six games.
customer_reviews.author: Rainn Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Great case but limit carrying space
customer_reviews.text: I loved this small case, I purchased it for my switch of course. But after placing my charger and cable along with the switch. The case it self bulged barely able to contain the bare essentials I needed. If you don't plan on taking a battery pack, joy con rails or any other additional accessory you may need, then this is a good buy. If you have a switch battery pack attached to your gaming console, plus charging cables, rails and games, then you may want to look at other cases.
customer_reviews.author: Khoury Smith

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with the zippered pouch as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It's an overall standard case. It was between this and the amazon basics one which seems slimmer but does not include a handle. I would rate this case higher if it came with the advertised zippered pouch. The pouch isn't shown on the product pictures except for the mario and zelda cases but a black case with the zipper can be seen in the product description picture that compares this case to other cases and it can be seen in other customer posted pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Miss M

customer_reviews.title: Hardshell case is solid and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself and liked it so much I bought another one for my brother-in-law when he got his switch. Well made and a great size that protects the device well. Soft inside doesn't leave any scratches, game storage containers are useful and easy to use. Able to store many games in the case - more than I have. Because of the safety, security, and convenience of this case, I've been encouraged to bring my Switch more places.
customer_reviews.author: J. HallahanTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: It did smell like smoke, but only if I actively tried sniffing ...
customer_reviews.text: Game holders fall out if you open it with the console in staying stationary in the bottom. If you open it with the game holders staying stationary on the bottom then the Switch is face down and at risk of falling if whatever's in the zipper pouch is lumpy, which power cords often are. It did smell like smoke, but only if I actively tried sniffing it. It didn't stink up the area or anything.
customer_reviews.author: kita8

customer_reviews.title: Love this newer model!
customer_reviews.text: Saw that Amazon was selling a newer model (with built-in kickstand) of this officially licensed case. Brick and mortar stores were selling an older model without the kickstand for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin D. Yang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of having the switch on the go! (I just bought the original version). I really wanted to have the benefits of both a console and a handheld, and now I can with this case. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Wilks

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice case that protects my switch and I love that it has the spot for individual games. I also like that it can still fit/close with my third party grip on it. The one downside that is really bothering me is the strong overwhelming smell of the case. It smells terrible. I put my switch in it for about 5 minutes and when I took it out my switch then had the smell too. I am hoping a charcoal pack will absorb the order, as this is otherwise a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Well made case
customer_reviews.text: Came well packed and very nice case. The flaps where u put the games is nice and holds them in place. Also on the top where the pocket it’s got cushioning to protect with that whatsoever is in there! Overall very good and well made case!!,!!
customer_reviews.author: virginia coyle

customer_reviews.title: Great case for a busy kid!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case for my son. He likes how easy it is to fit everything in and how well it protects his prized possession. We both love the red game holder that comes with it. It’s easy to spot and a great way to keep his tiny games together and portable. Great buy and I would recommend this to anyone with a Switch.
customer_reviews.author: Caryl

customer_reviews.title: Good, small case, but the game holder could use a redesign.
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size to take my Switch and a few games on the go. The case is built nicely, with the padding molded to the contours of the console and joycons. There is a small zipper pouch which is quite small - would maybe hold a USB cable. There is no room for an AC adapter. My primary complaint is with the small plastic game case that fits inside the main case. Games do no "snap" in - making them prone to falling out when opening it up to switch games. Overall, this is a good case and I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Berry

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Got this case for my brother for Christmas. He says he loves it and puts his Switch in it then puts it all in his bag that he brings to work every day. He says it’s really durable and for the price I don’t think you’ll find a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Get more than you bargain for
customer_reviews.text: My switch fits snugly in this case so it doesn't rattle around. The extra game cases inside are super cool and convenient! The case is extremely durable from feeling and holding it. Very nice zipper closure. I appreciate the "stand" feature so I can play on a pro controller. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gillis

customer_reviews.title: No  inside pocket !!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a nice case but mine did not come with an inside pocket like it shows in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Harper

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy case that holds up to abuse and protects the Switch
customer_reviews.text: I bicycle commute everywhere and carry all my things in a large saddle bag with little to no pockets inside. Things regularly get beat up in there from things bouncing around (U-lock, etc) or crushed under 30 lbs of groceries or whatever I happen to be hauling. So I was understandably a bit worried carrying my Switch around with me in there and was in the market for a tough solid case. I've been using the case for a little over a month now (since the Switch launched) and so far the case has held up extremely well and the Switch has no signs of damage (I don't use a screen protector or any other protection for the record).
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ellis

customer_reviews.title: There isn't a more perfect Nintendo Switch carrying case!
customer_reviews.text: Hard-shell interior construction, very durable nylon exterior, high quality zipper. Spaces inside for small game cartridges, and even a velcro safety that holds the Switch in place from falling out of the case in the event that the zipper is undone and the case is picked up by the handle. PERFECTLY ENGINEERED.
customer_reviews.author: Lane Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case
customer_reviews.text: I use this case to carry my switch with me to work for my playing pleasure on my commute or when on break.. it is durable, convenient and just the right size; for the people complaining about their switches turning on... turn it off completely instead of sleep mode
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B

customer_reviews.title: Safety first!
customer_reviews.text: Nintendo definitely got this one right! Fits perfectly and has a great place for your games to hide (8 games). Keeps my sons Switch safe while traveling as well as safe when not being used. Would buy again in a heartbeat!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Angevine

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, excellent details, some minor design flaws
customer_reviews.text: The red detailing on the zipper is great and the inside feels extremely secure for the Switch, but I wish it didn't use a velcro tag inside, and I don't know why the game cartridge cases are so hard to open without popping all of the games out (the cases themselves also pop out of the overall case very easily).
customer_reviews.author: D. Uncapher

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty nice case
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice case. Feels sturdy and of good quality. Switch fits in there nice and snug. There is a compartment underneath where the Switch would go that has 2 little plastic boxes to hold game cartridges. It doesn't look like you'll be able to fit much else in there, but overall a pretty nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and helpful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister-in-law for Christmas for her switch and it was exactly what she wanted (albeit it was on her Christmas list because she had done research about it). This holds everything she needs and she's able to carry it with her wherever she needs to go. Easy to pack and easy to grab and go.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: SISTER LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: My sister loves this product! It came just in time for her birthday and I was surprised it came in giving the state of the world right now. I Allred’s te the company for sending it out fast.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not what i ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking it had the Pocket (wanted to put my stylus inside) but when it arrived the pocket (clearly shown on product pictures) was not there. Just a stand, which while not bad is not what i wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Mezcao

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case to keep your Switch safe
customer_reviews.text: Purchased with Nintendo Switch. Looks good. Great slim profile while offering good protection. No weird smell which I know happens sometimes with cases. Includes game cartridge cases but I mostly buy digital so they’re just there. Great price. Especially compared to other switch accessories.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS DISCRIBED
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have a zipper pocket (show in pictures) and the folding tab is stiff and doesn't fit right....
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case to hold the Switch
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES this case for his Nintendo Switch. It's nice that it has padding and a compartment to hold the case...which hold his game too. The quality is good and this is actual Nintendo gear. It stays well protected and I highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mai196

customer_reviews.title: Missing features, zero room
customer_reviews.text: The item I received does not have a zipper pouch inside as proclaimed. Besides room for the Switch itself and the plastic cases for games, there is zero room for anything. So if you want room for an extra pair of joy-cons, or even the joy-con covers or cable, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Liad Horowitz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good case
customer_reviews.text: I like the case, its sturdy and the switch fits nicely. There's barely any room for anything else though, no charger, extra joycons, etc. The game cases are very loose in their slots, and games sit loosely inside the cases, which I don't particularly like. I attached some fabric Velcro to the case and the back of the game cases to fix one of those issues, and that works nicely. I didn't have any smell issues like some reported. Pretty good case, though I think I'd have liked something a bit different better
customer_reviews.author: Laura Bednark

customer_reviews.title: Great travel sized cased
customer_reviews.text: This case works amazing for the Nintendo Switch. There is enough room to fit the Switch itself with the joy cons and a couple of games or micro SD cards. It comes with plastic cases for the physical copies of games to keep them secure. The case is very protective and I would recommend it to anyone trying to find a good and compact travel case for the switch. The only downside of this case is there is no room for cables.
customer_reviews.author: Will Drake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent If You Play On the Go!
customer_reviews.text: This item is pretty great! I wanted something that would protect my Switch when I take it on the go and this is it. I also got it because it is actually the real Nintendo one. I know that other brands make them but I wanted the Nintendo one because I figure that they know their product best.
customer_reviews.author: James Agee

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this case
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this case. It was perfect for my six hour drive, it kept my switch nice and cozy during a two hour flight, and I've even dropped it once or twice and haven't noticed any damage whatsoever. I'm very happy with this product, and I urge anyone who's going to be traveling with their Switch to either buy this case, or their "Nintendo Switch Game Traveler Deluxe System Case" if you want to bring the whole set up.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bucket

customer_reviews.title: Good quality case and accessories
customer_reviews.text: I received this item not too long ago for my Nintendo Switch. I found that the quality appears to be really good and sturdy. I also love the fact that it has two cases to keep games in within the case. Loving this and makes it easy for transport.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton L

customer_reviews.title: Not original!!!
customer_reviews.text: Misleading item description and photo. Had to return this item. We got an imitation / no-brand carrying case in the original Nintendo Switch brand package, which, by the way, was broken. Also none of the included items were there. Very disappointing. This was intendend as a Christmas gift. Had to purchase another one locally to replace the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Carol C

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy on the eyes, fits the switch, 4 games, and the 2 joycons. Would’ve been nice if the game plastic cases didn’t fall out of the case or if the model I purchased had a zipper for other stuff, but for the price it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Switch Case
customer_reviews.text: Hard durable exterior case that is molded to the shape of the Switch. I have traveled with it quite a bit, packed tightly into my backpack and have not had any issues. Has an interior pocket to fit small accessories and two cases that will hold 4 physical games each (8 total). Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin Wong

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Solid, good material, well made. I love the little game cartridge cases that come with it and the little pouch kind of acts as a screen cleaner! Would most definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Delivery Time
customer_reviews.text: It's a Switch case alright, comes with 2 game card cases for physical swith games, even comes with 2 micro sd card cases. The problem I have with this product was the delivery, it just took too long. I know this is petty af but I don't think a Nintendo Switch case delivery should take nearly a month. Other than my personal issue, it's a fair case for a fair price, but if you have more than 2 joycons or a pro controller, this case isn't really ideal.
customer_reviews.author: some dude with long hair

customer_reviews.title: Great Switch carrying case!
customer_reviews.text: The beauty of the Switch is that you can take it with you. This case is the best. I get compliments on the "Mario Overalls" look and the inside allows to keep the game cards (not sure what you call them), and the case is tuff, so it protects my Switch. Really like it, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kelle Jones

customer_reviews.title: ... Switch is digital only which makes the cartridge cases unnecessary for me
customer_reviews.text: My Switch is digital only which makes the cartridge cases unnecessary for me. I toss this in my bag every day before going to work with peace of mind to keep my investment safe. The price seems totally justified for the quality. I recommend this to my fellow predominantly solo digital gamers that don't need to hold a pro controller or various accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Otto Andersson

customer_reviews.title: Good case but...
customer_reviews.text: Good case but the pictures and description are misleading. There is no zip up pouch for accessories inside of the case. I wish I had known that sooner because I definitely would've gone with a different case that did have that extra accessory storage.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids needed a safer way of bringing our switch, and propping it up to play. This case keeps it safe, allows them to prop it to play, and holds their games. As a parent, I have 0 complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Leonard

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy but half of the case is basically useless
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy but half of the case is basically useless. You can fit your console and the controllers on one side but the other side doesn't really fit much else except games, cords and maybe other controllers. I was hoping to fit the power supply but they made that thing so fat that it's impossible.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Protects, compact, quick
customer_reviews.text: This is convenient, compact, and works well. My Switch is protected while I move from home to the bus to work and I would not want to think about what condition it would be in if I just threw the Switch itself into my backpack without being in this case. I also store some earbuds in the case - I just put them in the case, then put my Switch in, so the buds are behind the Switch. No problems!
customer_reviews.author: Mark K. Monnin

customer_reviews.title: great case love the added game cases and the fact ...
customer_reviews.text: great case love the added game cases and the fact that they are red being my favorite colors are red and black, my only gripe with the case is the zipper handle having the switch logo on it. Really wish they just kept it black or red and not advertised what is in the case to all those who see it but that's just me nitpicking
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to keep the main unit of my Switch protected. I’ve had it for over two years now. Definitely glad I have it. The game card cases fit physical games and micro sd cards great. As others have mentioned, the initial smell that the case has goes away.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: No zip pouch
customer_reviews.text: pictures made it look like there would be. It was a selling point for me sucks it didnt have it
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Better safe than sorry
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son work great to keep it safe and carry extra games, only downfall is you cant carry the charger or charge it while in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs T momma of 3

customer_reviews.title: Missing zipper pouch
customer_reviews.text: Case seems sturdy, however was disappointed that it didn’t come with the zipper pouch
customer_reviews.author: Armando Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Good but you can get something way better at the same price
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty good case but I just found something better for the same price. My suggestion is that you lower the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rude Jay

customer_reviews.title: Thief magnet.
customer_reviews.text: Is good, holds the switch nicely and doesn't allow for much movement . The joy cons have space so they aren't applied pressure. Feels very good and high quality. Aside the fact that you're advertising you're carrying a switch, this is the best case there is
customer_reviews.author: Killian

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, made well.
customer_reviews.text: The case is made well, wipes clean fairly easily, protects the nintendo switch nicely, handy little net pockets to organize. I am satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ok case for the switch..but
customer_reviews.text: i feel the case is sturdy enough for the switch itself and came with the game cases; however the model i received doesnt include a front zip pocket so i am left with no place to put the joy-con adapters or even a charge cable inside the case to keep it all together.
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: A Nice, Sturdy Case
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice sturdy, case. I feel like my Switch and games are very well protected in the case. Unfortunately there's not room for much else in the case, but what does fit in there is well protected.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Quiggle

customer_reviews.title: This case is a beast
customer_reviews.text: No moving things around or jamming things in or lying sbout what this could be. What I got is solid and trustworthy, like it is a really decently hard case:thank you. It feels like it protects... I know this sounds lame. But honestly: good buy for less than $14, you might be surprised ehat you can do with this... ... Seriously, It is what it is. Do not make things worse if you can help it. I wish there were a few excess gameholders
customer_reviews.author: John Q. Public

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Portability
customer_reviews.text: I own a switch and leave it in this carrying case whenever I'm not using it. It's perfect for storing the system, 2 joycons, a handful of games, and any cables or small accessories. The inside is soft, plush padding which will keep the Switch screen scratch-free. The only con to this case is that there's no easy way to pack a charger inside. If you're looking for an all-in-one case, you'll likely need something a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Nick J.

customer_reviews.title: Protective Case
customer_reviews.text: The case arrived on time and is easy to handle, with a slim handle and great cushioning inside. It's easy to use and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Z.

customer_reviews.title: Added velcro
customer_reviews.text: Overall a sturdy and well made case. I would have liked to see it be able to carry the charging cord, not a big deal. The game cartidge holders needed velcro to connect to the back of the case because they end up falling out of thier pre sloted holes very easily. That easy fix made this case worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brock

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong case.
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this it was advertised as being the old style with the storage pouch. I received the new style with no pouch and a display stand instead. The display stand has no vent holes for the intake on the back of the system.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe G.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and size
customer_reviews.text: Nice simple case with space for physical cartridges. Good for air travel, work trips, going to the cabin. Durable material and rigid enough to protect your Switch being carried in a suitcase or backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Crage Nelson

customer_reviews.title: NINTENDO CASE
customer_reviews.text: I received my case in a timely manner. It was just what I wanted. My grandson will really like the new case for the Nintendo Switch Mr. Santa Clause will bring
customer_reviews.author: Tightwad

customer_reviews.title: Tiny!
customer_reviews.text: This case is tiny.. much smaller than I expected and does not carry the console. I am reconsidering an exchange for something that will carry my gear. I haven’t opened my case yet, but it does seem of the highest quality for a gaming case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Nintendo Switch Case
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy, holds eight game cards and travels well. It does not hold the charger, which I didn’t expect it to. I recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: ih

customer_reviews.title: Good protection for my Switch!
customer_reviews.text: I traveled a few times with this case and it held up each time! It holds all my games and keeps my Switch safe. It isn’t heavy either, even with my Switch inside. Recommend if you like taking your Switch out often!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Holds the switch very well. Feels nice and sturdy, I have confidence that I could drop or throw this case around and the switch would be perfectly fine. Has extra space so the analog sticks on the controllers aren't being pressed or moved which I worry about so that's extra bonus points.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Protection on the go
customer_reviews.text: At the time of purchase I got it cheaper than the brick and mortar stores. It’s a durable case and does the job protecting my switch.
customer_reviews.author: Pelleas80

customer_reviews.title: Trustworthy case
customer_reviews.text: It's not spacious, but it fits the Switch well along with the joycon caps and up to 8 games. I think the game cases are a little fiddly, but they are nice and they remind me of Gameboy game cases.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why I bought offbrand..
customer_reviews.text: Stick with brand names. Perfect case, with game cartidge case included as well as micro sd card holder. The case has indetns where the ZL and ZR buttons are. Gives it enough protection. I might of had a faint "smokey" or just dirt smell but nothing to worry about these are brand new. Just air them out for a few hours or overnight. No complaints on my end! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

product_meta.title: RDS Industries, Inc Nintendo Switch Game Traveler Deluxe Travel Case
product_meta.description: Protect and organize your Nintendo Switch in this Officially Nintendo Licensed Deluxe Travel Case. RDS Industries has manufactured this case to Nintendo's stringent and high standards. This Nintendo Switch case has a durable hard-shell exterior that protects against accidental drops or knocks. A vacuum formed felt-lined interior holds the system and games securely in place. Most importantly, a padded divider pocket is put inside and is designed specifically to protect Switch's sensitive analog sticks. Two bonus multi-game cases are included that hold up to 8 games.
feature_bullets: RDS Industries, Inc. is the #1 Nintendo Licensed Switch case manufacturer nationwide.
Exterior: Durable hard-shell case made with Ballistic Nylon or PU Leather, comfort grip handle and custom Easy glide zipper.
Interior: Specifically Designed to protect the Joy-Con analog sticks, padded screen protection panel, quick access zippered pocket for accessories and features a recessed compartment for game cases.
Also included: 2 multi-game cases, each case holds 4 games safely and securely. 2 micro SD card cases, each case holds 1 SD card, each SD card case fits into any section of the multi-game case.
RDS Industries Deluxe Travel Case has been approved by Nintendo's high-quality Standards.
